price: 48. Oo xus Ismaaciil iyo Al-Yasac iyo Dul-Kifil, dhammaan waxay ka mid yihiin akhyaarta.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ وَكُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَخۡيَارِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wadhā al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyāri
